title: Nocera on college football, the NBA's bubble strategy
itunes:title: Nocera on college football, the NBA's bubble strategy
description:
Our pal, Bloomberg Opinion columnist (plus bestselling author and podcaster extraordinaire) Joe Nocera stops by to talk about the prospects for a college football season and why the door may be closing for a fall as we're used to. Plus, he tells us why he's bullish on the NBA's chances to get back to work late next month.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
